structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-128. Continuing police powers.
The Registrant shall at all times during the life of the Registration be subject to all lawful exercise of the police power of the County and to all lawful nondiscriminatory regulations as the County subsequently enacts based upon its existing powers or additional powers given it in the future. The Registrant shall comply with all laws, statutes, codes, ordinances, rules, or regulations applicable to its business. The Registrant shall at all times comply with the requirements of Article III of this Chapter. Specific and exact compliance to all zoning and building regulations shall be adhere[d] to by the Registrant.
